price: ߏ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߡߊߝߊ߲߭ ߝߍ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߏ ߡߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ( ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ) ߛߎߓߊ߮ ߟߋ߬ ߥߟߊ߫ ߝߊ߬ߕߐ߫
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
